description_top: Maḥzor for the entire year, Western Ashkenazi rite
catalogue_description: Hebrew and Judaica Manuscripts at the Bodleian Libraries, Oxford University
title: Maḥzor for the entire year, Western Ashkenazi rite
description: First volume of a two-volume set. First volume contains Four Special Sabbaths, Passover, Shavuot, and Rosh ha-Shanah; second volume (MS. Reggio 2) contains Yom Kipur, Sukot and Śimḥat Torah.
